cms.query.QueryText:
-- ChatMessageLastModified and ChatMessageCreatedWhen has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
INSERT INTO Chat_Message ( [ChatMessageCreatedWhen], [ChatMessageIPAddress], [ChatMessageUserID], [ChatMessageRoomID], [ChatMessageRejected], [ChatMessageLastModified], [ChatMessageText], [ChatMessageSystemMessageType], [ChatMessageRecipientID] ) VALUES ( GETDATE() , @ChatMessageIPAddress , @ChatMessageUserID , @ChatMessageRoomID , @ChatMessageRejected , GETDATE() , @ChatMessageText , @ChatMessageSystemMessageType , @ChatMessageRecipientID); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS [ChatMessageID]
